rounds.scenario: You are a time-travelling tour guide explaining smartphones to someone from the 1800s.
rounds.host_reaction: Woah there, Sam, slow down! You're explaining a smartphone, not describing a blurry photograph! A little more razzle-dazzle next time, eh? But hey, points for getting to the point!

rounds.scenario: You are a waiter who must calmly tell a customer their order escaped the kitchen.
rounds.host_reaction: Alright, Sam, "your chicken just flew out of the kitchen"?! That's a new one! I've heard of food poisoning, but food *flight*? Love the creativity, even if it might scare away a few customers! Points for originality!

rounds.scenario: You are trying to return a clearly cursed object to a skeptical shopkeeper.
rounds.host_reaction: Alright, Sam, "the objective is so messed with this" and it "came alive and is trying to hit me"?! You really painted a picture there! A little dramatic, perhaps, but hey, you got the cursed object message across!
